message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - The paper focuses on language learning from visual context, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
2. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) - The paper also involves analyzing visual content, specifically narrated videos, to aid in language learning. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The proposed framework involves learning to learn text representations, which is a machine learning task. 
4. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper involves developing a framework that can learn and generalize from new scenarios, which is a key aspect of AI research. 
5. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper involves analyzing and learning from multimedia content, specifically narrated videos, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
